example.eg: He worked hard to gain the respect of his coworkers.
example.egtrans: 他努力工作来获得同事的尊重。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 尊重, 敬重, 尊敬

example.eg: Out of respect for his desires, I won't go to the party.
example.egtrans: 顾及到他的想法，我不会去参加派对。

example.eg: In which respect do you not like his personality?
example.egtrans: 你不喜欢他性格的哪个方面？

example.eg: Even if you don't agree with your boss, you have to show respect.
example.egtrans: 即使你不认同老板的意见，你也必须表示尊重。

example.eg: As an aspiring writer, I respect published authors.
example.egtrans: 作为一位有理想的作家，我尊敬出版过作品的作家。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 尊敬, 敬重, 仰慕

example.eg: They all respected him for his hard work.
example.egtrans: 他们都因为他的勤恳工作而敬佩他。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 因为某事崇敬某人, 由于某事敬佩某人

example.eg: I really respect Phoebe for volunteering at the hospital.
example.egtrans: 菲比在医院做义工，我真的很敬佩她。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 由于某事尊敬某人, 由于某事敬佩某人

example.eg: He respected his wife's desire to live as an artist.
example.egtrans: 他尊重妻子保持艺术家生活的愿望。

example.eg: He never respected the privacy of his children.
example.egtrans: 他从来都不尊重自己孩子们的隐私。

example.eg: The generals, because of their bravery and wisdom, command respect from their troops.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 令人肃然起敬, 令人敬佩

example.eg: He has always treated me with great respect.
I have great respect for people who help others.
He is a gentleman in every respect.
The plaintiff was awarded damages in respect of the costs incurred.
Vancouver is one of North America's most progressive cities in respect to drug policy.
She's kind of shy but in that respect she's no different than I am.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在那方面，就那一点而言

example.eg: It was a big mistake; in this respect we both agree.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在这方面, 就这一点而言, 在这点上

example.eg: You shouldn't let your children speak to you like that, it shows a lack of respect.
As far as I am concerned everyone is equal and I won't call my boss "Sir", but some people say this shows a lack of respect.
People who are unemployed for a long time sometimes lose their self-respect.
It is important that hotel staff show respect when dealing with guests.
We train all our employees to show respect for the customers.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…表现出敬意, 对…表示尊重

example.eg: You have to show respect when you meet members of the royal family.
You need to show more respect to your father.
With all due respect, I couldn't disagree more.
With due respect I have a different opinion.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 恕我直言, 冒昧地说一句

example.eg: With respect, I think you are wrong in your argument.
With respect to your problems, I'm afraid I can't help at all.
example.egtrans: 就你的问题而言，很遗憾我无能为力。

example.eg: Millionaires can buy what they want without respect to the cost.
